Interface IAssetInfo

Basic metadata for a content asset.

Namespace: StardewModdingAPI
Assembly: StardewModdingAPI.dll
Syntax
public interface IAssetInfo

Properties

| Improve this Doc View Source

AssetName

The normalised asset name being read. The format may change between platforms; see AssetNameEquals(String) to compare with a known path.

Declaration

Property Value

System.String

AssetNameEquals(String)

Get whether the asset name being loaded matches a given name after normalisation.

Declaration
bool AssetNameEquals(string path)
Parameters
Type Name Description
System.String path

The expected asset path, relative to the game's content folder and without the .xnb extension or locale suffix (like 'Data\ObjectInformation').
Returns
Type Description
System.Boolean
